mapper.insert: insert into cm_swiper (id, tenant_id, group_name, title, picture, link, open_target, order_no, creator, creator_name, create_time) values(#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{groupName}, #{title}, #{picture}, #{link}, #{openTarget}, #{orderNo}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, now())
mapper.select: select * from cm_swiper where tenant_id=#{tenantId} and id=#{id}
